                             ===Issue===                                                                                            
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                              
                                                                                                                                    
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Summary                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                    
                             A libFuzzer execution terminated with a timeout error, indicating that the fuzzing                     
                             campaign did not complete within the allotted time frame.                                              
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Description                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
                             - Issue Overview                                                                                       
                               During a fuzzing session driven by libFuzzer, the process exceeded its maximum                       
                             allowed execution time and was forcefully stopped with the error message ERROR:                       
                             libFuzzer: timeout.                                                                                   
                                                                                                                                    
                             - Vulnerability Type                                                                                   
                               The issue report does not specify any particular vulnerability class (e.g., buffer                   
                             overflow, use-after-free). It solely indicates an operational interruption due to a                    
                             timeout.                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                    
                             - Key Observations and Findings                                                                        
                                The fuzzer harness served as the entry point for fuzz testing but did not itself                   
                             trigger a crash or detect a memory safety violationrather, the execution was                          
                             interrupted by a timeout.                                                                              
                                A timeout in libFuzzer commonly arises when the code under test enters a                           
                             long-running or non-terminating path, or when coverage-guided exploration stalls on                    
                             computationally expensive inputs.                                                                      
                                No crash data, stack traces, or sanitizer reports accompany the timeout,                           
                             suggesting that the code did not produce a memory or control-flow error within the                     
                             time budget.                                                                                           
                                                                                                                                    
                             - Code Areas for Investigation                                                                         
                               To obtain a comprehensive understanding of why the timeout occurred, the following                   
                             components should be reviewed:                                                                         
                               1. Fuzzing Harness                                                                                   
                                  - Review initialization and teardown logic to ensure that the harness passes                      
                             control promptly to the target functions and does not itself introduce blocking or                     
                             delays.                                                                                                
                               2. Targeted Functions and Hot Loops                                                                  
                                  - Identify loops, recursive calls, or algorithmic branches in the code under test                 
                             that may process certain inputs indefinitely or very slowly.                                           
                                  - Pay particular attention to external I/O, cryptographic routines, or                            
                             large-data-path code segments that can consume excessive CPU time.                                     
                               3. Resource Usage and Limits                                                                         
                                  - Examine any platform- or environment-specific timeouts, thread synchronization                  
                             constructs, or blocking system calls invoked during fuzzing.                                           
                               4. Coverage Feedback Path                                                                            
                                  - Verify whether the fuzzers coverage instrumentation is operating correctly;                    
                             misconfigured or missing instrumentation can stall input generation and exhaust the                    
                             timeout.                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                    
                             Investigating these areas will provide a holistic view of why libFuzzer did not                        
                             complete within its time limit and where to focus further analysis.                                    
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                   
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                         
                             <issue>                                                                                                
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                              
                                                                                                                                    
                             </issue>                                                                                               
                             ===Analysis Report===                                                                                  
                             # Analysis Report                                                                                      
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Relevant Code Snippets                                                                              
                             <code_snippets>                                                                                        
                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:400-500                                
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             400:                                                                                                   
                             401:    /**                                                                                            
                             402:     * Return true if parser is lenient. Meaning auto healing capacity of the                      
                             parser are used.                                                                                       
                             403:     *                                                                                             
                             404:     * @return true if parser is lenient                                                           
                             405:     */                                                                                            
                             406:    public boolean isLenient()                                                                     
                             407:    {                                                                                              
                             408:        return isLenient;                                                                          
                             409:    }                                                                                              
                             410:                                                                                                   
                             411:    /**                                                                                            
                             412:     * Change the parser leniency flag.                                                            
                             413:     *                                                                                             
                             414:     * This method can only be called before the parsing of the file.                              
                             415:     *                                                                                             
                             416:     * @param lenient try to handle malformed PDFs.                                                
                             417:     *                                                                                             
                             418:     */                                                                                            
                             419:    protected void setLenient(boolean lenient)                                                     
                             420:    {                                                                                              
                             421:        if (initialParseDone)                                                                      
                             422:        {                                                                                          
                             423:            throw new IllegalArgumentException("Cannot change leniency after                       
                             parsing");                                                                                             
                             424:        }                                                                                          
                             425:        this.isLenient = lenient;                                                                  
                             426:    }                                                                                              
                             427:                                                                                                   
                             428:    @Override                                                                                      
                             429:    public COSBase dereferenceCOSObject(COSObject obj) throws IOException                          
                             430:    {                                                                                              
                             431:        long currentPos = source.getPosition();                                                    
                             432:        COSObjectKey key = obj.getKey();                                                           
                             433:        COSBase parsedObj = parseObjectDynamically(key, false);                                    
                             434:        if (parsedObj != null)                                                                     
                             435:        {                                                                                          
                             436:            parsedObj.setDirect(false);                                                            
                             437:            parsedObj.setKey(key);                                                                 
                             438:        }                                                                                          
                             439:        if (currentPos > 0)                                                                        
                             440:        {                                                                                          
                             441:            source.seek(currentPos);                                                               
                             442:        }                                                                                          
                             443:        return parsedObj;                                                                          
                             444:    }                                                                                              
                             445:                                                                                                   
                             446:    @Override                                                                                      
                             447:    public RandomAccessReadView createRandomAccessReadView(long startPosition,                     
                             long streamLength)                                                                                     
                             448:            throws IOException                                                                     
                             449:    {                                                                                              
                             450:        return source.createView(startPosition, streamLength);                                     
                             451:    }                                                                                              
                             452:                                                                                                   
                             453:    /**                                                                                            
                             454:     * Parse the object for the given object key.                                                  
                             455:     *                                                                                             
                             456:     * @param objKey key of object to be parsed                                                    
                             457:     * @param requireExistingNotCompressedObj if <code>true</code> the object to                   
                             be parsed must be defined in xref                                                                      
                             458:     * (comment: null objects may be missing from xref) and it must not be a                       
                             compressed object within object stream                                                                 
                             459:     * (this is used to circumvent being stuck in a loop in a malicious PDF)                       
                             460:     *                                                                                             
                             461:     * @return the parsed object (which is also added to document object)                          
                             462:     *                                                                                             
                             463:     * @throws IOException If an IO error occurs.                                                  
                             464:     */                                                                                            
                             465:    private synchronized COSBase parseObjectDynamically(COSObjectKey objKey,                       
                             466:            boolean requireExistingNotCompressedObj) throws IOException                            
                             467:    {                                                                                              
                             468:        COSObject pdfObject = document.getObjectFromPool(objKey);                                  
                             469:        if (!pdfObject.isObjectNull())                                                             
                             470:        {                                                                                          
                             471:            return pdfObject.getObject();                                                          
                             472:        }                                                                                          
                             473:        Long offsetOrObjstmObNr = getObjectOffset(objKey,                                          
                             requireExistingNotCompressedObj);                                                                      
                             474:        COSBase referencedObject = null;                                                           
                             475:        if (offsetOrObjstmObNr != null)                                                            
                             476:        {                                                                                          
                             477:            if (offsetOrObjstmObNr > 0)                                                            
                             478:            {                                                                                      
                             479:                referencedObject = parseFileObject(offsetOrObjstmObNr, objKey);                    
                             480:            }                                                                                      
                             481:            else                                                                                   
                             482:            {                                                                                      
                             483:                // xref value is object nr of object stream containing object to                   
                             be parsed                                                                                              
                             484:                // since our object was not found it means object stream was not                   
                             parsed so far                                                                                          
                             485:                referencedObject = parseObjectStreamObject(-offsetOrObjstmObNr,                    
                             objKey);                                                                                               
                             486:            }                                                                                      
                             487:        }                                                                                          
                             488:        if (referencedObject == null || referencedObject instanceof COSNull)                       
                             489:        {                                                                                          
                             490:            // not defined object -> NULL object (Spec. 1.7, chap. 3.2.9)                          
                             491:            // or some other issue with dereferencing                                              
                             492:            // remove parser to avoid endless recursion                                            
                             493:            pdfObject.setToNull();                                                                 
                             494:        }                                                                                          
                             495:        return referencedObject;                                                                   
                             496:    }                                                                                              
                             497:                                                                                                   
                             498:    private Long getObjectOffset(COSObjectKey objKey, boolean                                      
                             requireExistingNotCompressedObj)                                                                       
                             499:            throws IOException                                                                     
                             500:    {                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:500-550                                
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             500:    {                                                                                              
                             501:        // read offset or object stream object number from xref table                              
                             502:        Long offsetOrObjstmObNr = document.getXrefTable().get(objKey);                             
                             503:                                                                                                   
                             504:        // maybe something is wrong with the xref table -> perform brute force                     
                             search for all objects                                                                                 
                             505:        if (offsetOrObjstmObNr == null && isLenient)                                               
                             506:        {                                                                                          
                             507:            offsetOrObjstmObNr =                                                                   
                             getBruteForceParser().getBFCOSObjectOffsets().get(objKey);                                             
                             508:            if (offsetOrObjstmObNr != null)                                                        
                             509:            {                                                                                      
                             510:                LOG.debug("Set missing offset {} for object {}",                                   
                             offsetOrObjstmObNr, objKey);                                                                           
                             511:                document.getXrefTable().put(objKey, offsetOrObjstmObNr);                           
                             512:            }                                                                                      
                             513:        }                                                                                          
                             514:                                                                                                   
                             515:        // test to circumvent loops with broken documents                                          
                             516:        if (requireExistingNotCompressedObj                                                        
                             517:                && (offsetOrObjstmObNr == null || offsetOrObjstmObNr <= 0))                        
                             518:        {                                                                                          
                             519:            throw new IOException("Object must be defined and must not be                          
                             compressed object: "                                                                                   
                             520:                    + objKey.getNumber() + ":" + objKey.getGeneration());                          
                             521:        }                                                                                          
                             522:        return offsetOrObjstmObNr;                                                                 
                             523:    }                                                                                              
                             524:                                                                                                   
                             525:    private COSBase parseFileObject(Long objOffset, final COSObjectKey objKey)                     
                             526:            throws IOException                                                                     
                             527:    {                                                                                              
                             528:        // jump to the object start                                                                
                             529:        source.seek(objOffset);                                                                    
                             530:                                                                                                   
                             531:        // an indirect object starts with the object number/generation number                      
                             532:        final long readObjNr = readObjectNumber();                                                 
                             533:        final int readObjGen = readGenerationNumber();                                             
                             534:        readObjectMarker();                                                                        
                             535:                                                                                                   
                             536:        // consistency check                                                                       
                             537:        if (readObjNr != objKey.getNumber() || readObjGen !=                                       
                             objKey.getGeneration())                                                                                
                             538:        {                                                                                          
                             539:            throw new IOException("XREF for " + objKey.getNumber() + ":"                           
                             540:                    + objKey.getGeneration() + " points to wrong object: " +                       
                             readObjNr                                                                                              
                             541:                    + ":" + readObjGen + " at offset " + objOffset);                               
                             542:        }                                                                                          
                             543:                                                                                                   
                             544:        skipSpaces();                                                                              
                             545:        COSBase parsedObject = parseDirObject();                                                   
                             546:        if (parsedObject != null)                                                                  
                             547:        {                                                                                          
                             548:            parsedObject.setDirect(false);                                                         
                             549:            parsedObject.setKey(objKey);                                                           
                             550:        }                                                                                          
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/COSParser.java:241-295                                
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             241:    protected COSDictionary retrieveTrailer() throws IOException                                   
                             242:    {                                                                                              
                             243:        COSDictionary trailer = null;                                                              
                             244:        boolean rebuildTrailer = false;                                                            
                             245:        try                                                                                        
                             246:        {                                                                                          
                             247:            // parse startxref                                                                     
                             248:            // TODO FDF files don't have a startxref value, so that rebuildTrailer                 
                             is triggered                                                                                           
                             249:            long startXRefOffset = getStartxrefOffset();                                           
                             250:            if (startXRefOffset > -1)                                                              
                             251:            {                                                                                      
                             252:                XrefParser xrefParser = new XrefParser(this);                                      
                             253:                trailer = xrefParser.parseXref(document, startXRefOffset);                         
                             254:                xrefTable.putAll(xrefParser.getXrefTable());                                       
                             255:            }                                                                                      
                             256:            else                                                                                   
                             257:            {                                                                                      
                             258:                rebuildTrailer = isLenient();                                                      
                             259:            }                                                                                      
                             260:        }                                                                                          
                             261:        catch (IOException exception)                                                              
                             262:        {                                                                                          
                             263:            if (isLenient())                                                                       
                             264:            {                                                                                      
                             265:                rebuildTrailer = true;                                                             
                             266:            }                                                                                      
                             267:            else                                                                                   
                             268:            {                                                                                      
                             269:                throw exception;                                                                   
                             270:            }                                                                                      
                             271:        }                                                                                          
                             272:        // check if the trailer contains a Root object                                             
                             273:        if (trailer != null && trailer.getItem(COSName.ROOT) == null)                              
                             274:        {                                                                                          
                             275:            rebuildTrailer = isLenient();                                                          
                             276:        }                                                                                          
                             277:        if (rebuildTrailer)                                                                        
                             278:        {                                                                                          
                             279:            // reset cross reference table                                                         
                             280:            xrefTable.clear();                                                                     
                             281:            trailer = getBruteForceParser().rebuildTrailer(xrefTable);                             
                             282:            trailerWasRebuild = true;                                                              
                             283:        }                                                                                          
                             284:        else                                                                                       
                             285:        {                                                                                          
                             286:            // prepare decryption if necessary                                                     
                             287:            prepareDecryption();                                                                   
                             288:            // don't use the getter as it creates an instance of BruteForceParser                  
                             289:            if (bruteForceParser != null && bruteForceParser.bfSearchTriggered())                  
                             290:            {                                                                                      
                             291:                getBruteForceParser().bfSearchForObjStreams(xrefTable);                            
                             292:            }                                                                                      
                             293:        }                                                                                          
                             294:        return trailer;                                                                            
                             295:    }                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BruteForceParser.java:132-208                         
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             132:    private void bfSearchForObjects() throws IOException                                           
                             133:    {                                                                                              
                             134:        long lastEOFMarker = bfSearchForLastEOFMarker();                                           
                             135:        long originOffset = source.getPosition();                                                  
                             136:        long currentOffset = MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET;                                                
                             137:        long lastObjectId = Long.MIN_VALUE;                                                        
                             138:        int lastGenID = Integer.MIN_VALUE;                                                         
                             139:        long lastObjOffset = Long.MIN_VALUE;                                                       
                             140:        char[] endobjString = "ndo".toCharArray();                                                 
                             141:        char[] endobjRemainingString = "bj".toCharArray();                                         
                             142:        boolean endOfObjFound = false;                                                             
                             143:        do                                                                                         
                             144:        {                                                                                          
                             145:            source.seek(currentOffset);                                                            
                             146:            int nextChar = source.read();                                                          
                             147:            currentOffset++;                                                                       
                             148:            if (BaseParser.isWhitespace(nextChar) && parser.isString(OBJ_MARKER))                  
                             149:            {                                                                                      
                             150:                long tempOffset = currentOffset - 2;                                               
                             151:                source.seek(tempOffset);                                                           
                             152:                int genID = source.peek();                                                         
                             153:                // is the next char a digit?                                                       
                             154:                if (BaseParser.isDigit(genID))                                                     
                             155:                {                                                                                  
                             156:                    genID -= 48;                                                                   
                             157:                    tempOffset--;                                                                  
                             158:                    source.seek(tempOffset);                                                       
                             159:                    if (parser.isWhitespace())                                                     
                             160:                    {                                                                              
                             161:                        while (tempOffset > MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET &&                               
                             parser.isWhitespace())                                                                                 
                             162:                        {                                                                          
                             163:                            source.seek(--tempOffset);                                             
                             164:                        }                                                                          
                             165:                        boolean objectIDFound = false;                                             
                             166:                        while (tempOffset > MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET &&                               
                             parser.isDigit())                                                                                      
                             167:                        {                                                                          
                             168:                            source.seek(--tempOffset);                                             
                             169:                            objectIDFound = true;                                                  
                             170:                        }                                                                          
                             171:                        if (objectIDFound)                                                         
                             172:                        {                                                                          
                             173:                            source.read();                                                         
                             174:                            long objectId = parser.readObjectNumber();                             
                             175:                            if (lastObjOffset > 0)                                                 
                             176:                            {                                                                      
                             177:                                // add the former object ID only if there was a                    
                             subsequent object ID                                                                                   
                             178:                                bfSearchCOSObjectKeyOffsets.put(                                   
                             179:                                        new COSObjectKey(lastObjectId, lastGenID),                 
                             lastObjOffset);                                                                                        
                             180:                            }                                                                      
                             181:                            lastObjectId = objectId;                                               
                             182:                            lastGenID = genID;                                                     
                             183:                            lastObjOffset = tempOffset + 1;                                        
                             184:                            currentOffset += OBJ_MARKER.length - 1;                                
                             185:                            endOfObjFound = false;                                                 
                             186:                        }                                                                          
                             187:                    }                                                                              
                             188:                }                                                                                  
                             189:            }                                                                                      
                             190:            // check for "endo" as abbreviation for "endobj", as the pdf may be                    
                             cut off                                                                                                
                             191:            // in the middle of the keyword, see PDFBOX-3936.                                      
                             192:            // We could possibly implement a more intelligent algorithm if                         
                             necessary                                                                                              
                             193:            else if (nextChar == 'e' && parser.isString(endobjString))                             
                             194:            {                                                                                      
                             195:                currentOffset += endobjString.length;                                              
                             196:                source.seek(currentOffset);                                                        
                             197:                if (parser.isEOF())                                                                
                             198:                {                                                                                  
                             199:                    endOfObjFound = true;                                                          
                             200:                }                                                                                  
                             201:                else if (parser.isString(endobjRemainingString))                                   
                             202:                {                                                                                  
                             203:                    currentOffset += endobjRemainingString.length;                                 
                             204:                    endOfObjFound = true;                                                          
                             205:                }                                                                                  
                             206:            }                                                                                      
                             207:        } while (currentOffset < lastEOFMarker && !parser.isEOF());                                
                             208:        if ((lastEOFMarker < Long.MAX_VALUE || endOfObjFound) && lastObjOffset >                   
                             0)                                                                                                     
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BruteForceParser.java:524-560                         
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             524:    private long bfSearchForLastEOFMarker() throws IOException                                     
                             525:    {                                                                                              
                             526:        long lastEOFMarker = -1;                                                                   
                             527:        long originOffset = source.getPosition();                                                  
                             528:        source.seek(MINIMUM_SEARCH_OFFSET);                                                        
                             529:        long tempMarker = findString(EOF_MARKER);                                                  
                             530:        while (tempMarker != -1)                                                                   
                             531:        {                                                                                          
                             532:            try                                                                                    
                             533:            {                                                                                      
                             534:                // check if the following data is some valid pdf content                           
                             535:                // which most likely indicates that the pdf is linearized,                         
                             536:                // updated or just cut off somewhere in the middle                                 
                             537:                parser.skipSpaces();                                                               
                             538:                if (!parser.isString(XREF_TABLE))                                                  
                             539:                {                                                                                  
                             540:                    parser.readObjectNumber();                                                     
                             541:                    parser.readGenerationNumber();                                                 
                             542:                }                                                                                  
                             543:            }                                                                                      
                             544:            catch (IOException exception)                                                          
                             545:            {                                                                                      
                             546:                // save the EOF marker as the following data is most likely some                   
                             garbage                                                                                                
                             547:                LOG.debug("An exception occurred during brute force for last EOF -                 
                             ignoring",                                                                                             
                             548:                        exception);                                                                
                             549:                lastEOFMarker = tempMarker;                                                        
                             550:            }                                                                                      
                             551:            tempMarker = findString(EOF_MARKER);                                                   
                             552:        }                                                                                          
                             553:        source.seek(originOffset);                                                                 
                             554:        // no EOF marker found                                                                     
                             555:        if (lastEOFMarker == -1)                                                                   
                             556:        {                                                                                          
                             557:            lastEOFMarker = Long.MAX_VALUE;                                                        
                             558:        }                                                                                          
                             559:        return lastEOFMarker;                                                                      
                             560:    }                                                                                              
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>                                                                                                
                             </code_snippets>

                             ===Issue===                                                                                            
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                              
                                                                                                                                    
                             ===Evaluation Report===                                                                                
                             # Evaluation Report                                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Summary                                                                                             
                                                                                                                                    
                             The fuzzer run against the PDFBox codebase terminated with a libFuzzer timeout. The                    
                             root symptom was that parsing routines never returned within the allotted time. In                     
                             response, the patch attempt added explicit iteration and bytecount limits to the                      
                             brute-force object search routines in BruteForceParser (methods `bfSearchForObjects`                   
                             and `bfSearchForLastEOFMarker`). Despite these guards, the fuzzer still hit a timeout.                 
                             The post-patch stack trace shows that execution is now spinning inside a                               
                             regular-expression compilation (`java.util.regex.Pattern.compile`), invoked from                       
                             `XrefParser.parseXrefTable`, indicating that the parsing hang shifted location but was                 
                             not resolved.                                                                                          
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Description                                                                                         
                                                                                                                                    
                             1. Initial Issue                                                                                       
                                - Fuzzer log:                                                                                       
                                  ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                         
                                - Context: A fuzz target invoking `Loader.loadPDF` on arbitrary inputs.                             
                                - Observation: The parser never returns; libFuzzer forcibly aborts after its                        
                             timeout threshold. No exceptions or error messages besides the timeout.                                
                                                                                                                                    
                             2. Key Findings in the Initial Issue                                                                   
                                - The parser likely entered a longrunning or infinite loop during structure                        
                             discovery.                                                                                             
                                - No stack trace was available because the timeout did not trigger an exception,                    
                             only the harness abort.                                                                                
                                                                                                                                    
                             3. Patch Attempt                                                                                       
                                - In `BruteForceParser.java` two new constants were added:                                          
                                     `MAX_BRUTE_FORCE_SEARCH_BYTES = 10 * 1024 * 1024`                                             
                                     `MAX_BRUTE_FORCE_ITERATIONS = 1_000_000`                                                      
                                - In `bfSearchForObjects()` a counter `iterationCount` was incremented each loop                    
                             and if it exceeds `MAX_BRUTE_FORCE_ITERATIONS` or if the search span exceeds                           
                             `MAX_BRUTE_FORCE_SEARCH_BYTES`, the loop issues a warning and breaks.                                  
                                - Similarly in `bfSearchForLastEOFMarker()`, an `iterationCount` guard breaks out                   
                             after `MAX_BRUTE_FORCE_ITERATIONS`.                                                                    
                                                                                                                                    
                             4. Post-Patch Result                                                                                   
                                - The fuzzer still times out.                                                                       
                                - A full thread dump shows the main thread blocked in:                                            
                                    java.util.regex.Pattern.expr  Pattern.compile  String.split                                   
                                     XrefParser.parseXrefTable  XrefParser.parseXref  COSParser.retrieveTrailer                  
                                     PDFParser.initialParse  PDFParser.parse  Loader.loadPDF  fuzzer entry.                     
                                - No more heavy looping in brute-force routines is observed; instead, the hang                      
                             occurs during cross-reference table parsing via regex.                                                 
                                                                                                                                    
                             5. Investigation Targets                                                                               
                                - XrefParser.parseXrefTable (around line 648 of `XrefParser.java`): how it invokes                  
                             `String.split` and on what input.                                                                      
                                - The code paths in `XrefParser.parseXref` and `COSParser.retrieveTrailer` that                     
                             lead to repeated regex compilation or splitting.                                                       
                                - Any use of regex or unbounded string operations in trailer and cross-reference                    
                             parsing that could loop infinitely or work on very large buffers.                                      
                                - Interaction between BruteForceParsers output and XrefParsers input: malformed                   
                             or oversized data may trigger pathological regex behavior.                                             
                                                                                                                                    
                             ---                                                                                                    
                             This report outlines the observed timeout, the patch applied to the brute-force search                 
                             loops, and the new hang location in the cross-reference parsing routines, in order to                  
                             guide further code review without speculating on root causes or solutions.                             
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Initial Issue Log                                                                                   
                             Here is the initial issue log of the codebase:                                                         
                             <issue>                                                                                                
                             ERROR: libFuzzer: timeout                                                                              
                                                                                                                                    
                             </issue>                                                                                               
                                                                                                                                    
                             ## Additional Issue Log                                                                                
                             Here is the additional issue log after the last patch attempt:

                             ```                                                                                                    
                             600:        // Xref tables can have multiple sections. Each starts with a starting                     
                             object id and a count.                                                                                 
                             601:        while(true)                                                                                
                             602:        {                                                                                          
                             603:            String currentLine = parser.readLine();                                                
                             604:            String[] splitString = currentLine.split("\\s");                                       
                             605:            if (splitString.length != 2)                                                           
                             606:            {                                                                                      
                             607:                LOG.warn("Unexpected XRefTable Entry: {}", currentLine);                           
                             608:                return false;                                                                      
                             609:            }                                                                                      
                             610:            // first obj id                                                                        
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>

                             625:            {

                             240:            return COSNull.NULL;                                                                   
                             241:        }                                                                                          
                             242:        if (!(generationNumber instanceof COSInteger))                                             
                             243:        {                                                                                          
                             244:            LOG.error("expected number, actual={} at offset {}", generationNumber,                 
                             genOffset);                                                                                            
                             245:            return COSNull.NULL;                                                                   
                             246:        }                                                                                          
                             247:        long objNumber = ((COSInteger) value).longValue();                                         
                             248:        if (objNumber <= 0)                                                                        
                             249:        {                                                                                          
                             250:            LOG.warn("invalid object number value ={} at offset {}", objNumber,                    
                             numOffset);                                                                                            
                             251:            return COSNull.NULL;                                                                   
                             252:        }                                                                                          
                             253:        int genNumber = ((COSInteger) generationNumber).intValue();                                
                             254:        if (genNumber < 0)                                                                         
                             255:        {                                                                                          
                             256:            LOG.error("invalid generation number value ={} at offset {}",                          
                             genNumber, numOffset);                                                                                 
                             257:            return COSNull.NULL;                                                                   
                             258:        }                                                                                          
                             259:        // dereference the object

                             261:    }                                                                                              
                             262:

                             264:    {                                                                                              
                             265:        if (document == null)                                                                      
                             266:        {                                                                                          
                             267:            throw new IOException("object reference " + key + " at offset " +                      
                             source.getPosition()                                                                                   
                             268:                    + " in content stream");                                                       
                             269:        }                                                                                          
                             270:        return document.getObjectFromPool(key);

                             <code>                                                                                                 
                             pdfbox/src/main/java/org/apache/pdfbox/pdfparser/BaseParser.java:1162-1188                             
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             1162:    protected String readLine() throws IOException                                                
                             1163:    {                                                                                             
                             1164:        if (source.isEOF())                                                                       
                             1165:        {                                                                                         
                             1166:            throw new IOException( "Error: End-of-File, expected line at offset "                 
                             +                                                                                                      
                             1167:                    source.getPosition());                                                        
                             1168:        }                                                                                         
                             1169:                                                                                                  
                             1170:        StringBuilder buffer = new StringBuilder( 11 );                                           
                             1171:                                                                                                  
                             1172:        int c;                                                                                    
                             1173:        while ((c = source.read()) != -1)                                                         
                             1174:        {                                                                                         
                             1175:            // CR and LF are valid EOLs                                                           
                             1176:            if (isEOL(c))                                                                         
                             1177:            {                                                                                     
                             1178:                break;                                                                            
                             1179:            }                                                                                     
                             1180:            buffer.append( (char)c );                                                             
                             1181:        }                                                                                         
                             1182:        // CR+LF is also a valid EOL                                                              
                             1183:        if (isCR(c) && isLF(source.peek()))                                                       
                             1184:        {                                                                                         
                             1185:            source.read();                                                                        
                             1186:        }                                                                                         
                             1187:        return buffer.toString();                                                                 
                             1188:    }                                                                                             
                             ```                                                                                                    
                             </code>
